official-title.#text:
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the healthcare, energy,
			 telecommunications, and other sectors of the United States economy should
			 continue their sector-specific efforts to protect critical infrastructure,
			 to prevent information security breaches, and to prevent cybersecurity
			 breaches.

sponsor.#tail: submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text: That it is the sense of the

the telecommunications sector should continue its sector-specific efforts to protect critical
			 infrastructure, to prevent information security breaches, and to prevent
			 cybersecurity breaches (other than for research and development purposes);
			 and

other industry sectors should continue their sector-specific efforts to protect critical
			 infrastructure, to prevent information security breaches, and to prevent
			 cybersecurity breaches (other than for research and development purposes).
Whereas the United States economy is diverse, and has many different sectors;

Whereas each sector faces different challenges related to critical infrastructure, information
			 security, and cybersecurity; and

Whereas the healthcare, energy, telecommunications, and other industry sectors are taking
			 sector-specific steps to protect critical infrastructure, to prevent
			 information security breaches, and to prevent cybersecurity breaches: Now,
			 therefore, be it

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HRES 769 IH: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the healthcare, energy, telecommunications, and other sectors of the United States economy should continue their sector-specific efforts to protect critical infrastructure, to prevent information security breaches, and to prevent cybersecurity breaches.
